mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sn AS "sn", a.year AS "year", a.rate_org AS "rateOrg", a.rate_project AS "rateProject", a.path AS "path", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org_check( sn, year, rate_org, rate_project, path, del_flag, create_date, create_by, remarks ) VALUES ( #{sn}, #{year}, #{rateOrg}, #{rateProject}, #{path}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE org_check SET sn = #{sn}, year = #{year}, rate_org = #{rateOrg}, rate_project = #{rateProject}, path = #{path}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT area_id from org where status = 3 ORDER BY rand() limit 1
